item.title: US Government Wallet Receives $50 in Bitcoin While Its Crypto Holdings Stand At $30 Billion
item.description: US government-tag wallets are frequently monitored and vulnerable to low-value pings, often used to trace wallets together.

item.title: 3 Polymarket Wallets Profit $630K Before Nicolás Maduro’s Arrest
item.description: Lookonchain called Polymarket's profit taking surrounding Nicolás Maduro's arrest insider trading.

item.title: 3 Polymarket Wallets Profit $630K Before Nicolás Maduro’s Arrest
item.description: Lookonchain called Polymarket's profit taking surrounding Nicolás Maduro's arrest insider trading.

item.title: Binance Founder CZ Says Crypto Market Remains ‘Tiny’ With Vast Upside Potential 'All Unrealized'
item.description: CZ says crypto remains small versus blockchain’s long-term potential, as adoption metrics point to early-stage growth.

item.title: Bitcoin Reclaims $91K On Geopolitical Jolt, Short Liquidations Drive Rally
item.description: The Saturday rally was mostly driven by Bitcoin’s liquidation figures of roughly $64.2 million in total liquidations over the past 24 hours.
